description: {{sbc|Innate - Ravenous:}} '''Swain''' can periodically target a nearby {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} enemy [[champion]] to rip out a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} from them, dealing {{pp|20 to 105}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them 290-units towards him. If the target would be brought past '''Swain''', they are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} the excess distance.
Enemy champions also leave behind a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} for 16 seconds upon [[death]], which can be harvested after 1 second if '''Swain''' is near them.

{{sbc|Innate - Flock:}} '''Swain's''' ravens bring nearby {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} to him, {{sti|healing|link=true}} him for {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|4 to 7|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' health}} and restoring {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|4 to 7|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' mana}}. Each {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} collected permanently increases his {{as|'''maximum''' health by 5}}.
i1.name: Ravenous Flock
notes: * The crows carrying the souls will only be seen by the enemies if they have {{tip|sight|vision}} of '''Swain'''.
* [[Decoys]] count as champions for dropping {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' unleashes five bolts of eldritch power in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in a cone. Enemies can be hit by multiple bolts, taking '''bonus''' [[damage]].
Bolts stop on impact with enemy champions.
q1.name: Death's Hand

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' summons a demonic eye at the target area, {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for 2 seconds, which explodes after {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, halved against minions, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
Enemy champions are {{tip|sight|revealed}} for an additional duration and have a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} ripped from them.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|100/2 to 300/2}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow Strength|{{ap|25 to 65}}%}}
w1.name: Vision of Empire
notes: * Even if [[spell shield]]ed, Swain will still acquire the {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.
* Enemies are able to see the VFX and hear the SFX of ''Vision of Empire'' through the [[fog of war]].

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' launches a demonic wave in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through.

Upon reaching its maximum distance, the wave returns to '''Swain''', detonating at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.name: Nevermove

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' frees the demon within for 12 seconds, gaining  {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}} and doubling the health gained from {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.

While ''Demonic Ascension'' is active, '''Swain''' drains all nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to them each second, and {{sti|healing|link=true}} himself for each enemy hit, reduced by 90% against [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s.
After draining any amount of health with ''Demonic Ascension'', '''Swain''' can end its effects early to cast {{ai|Demonflare|Swain}}, and automatically does so at the end of its duration.
If '''Swain''' dies during the channel time of ''Demonic Ascension'', the cooldown is fully refunded.
leveling:
{{st|Damage per Second|{{ap|420/12 to 780/12}} {{as|(+ {{fd|14.167}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|420 to 780}} {{as|(+ 170% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal per Second|{{ap|20 to 50}} {{as|(+ 16% AP)}}|Reduced Healing|{{ap|20*0.1 to 50*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Champion Heal|{{ap|20*12 to 50*12}} {{as|(+ 192% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Minion Heal|{{ap|20*12*0.1 to 50*12*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|19.2}}% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Demonic Ascension
notes: * {{ai|Demonic Ascension}} persists through revival effects (e.g {{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}).

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' releases a nova of energy, dealing a base amount of {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies plus 75% of the health drained during {{ai|Demonic Ascension|Swain}}, with the total damage capped.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r2.name: Demonflare
notes: * ''Demon Flare'' passes through champions. Effects like {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will block the portion of the nova they intercept.
